title: Interpretation of closing the door in a dream A closed door in a dream

preview.html: A vision of closing doors for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether he tries to close the door with the key with the lock, changes the color of the door for Ibn Shirin’s sake. Closing the door in a dream and trying to close the door in a dream is one of the very strange dreams that we constantly see in the dream and cause us anxiety. Big and moving to get the correct interpretation of the dream. Also, many of us may dream of closing the door in a dream, but we do not know what the dream holds for him, and we will explain to you in our article the interpretations of seeing the door closed in a dream for everyone and everyone. Situations that must be stopped. Interpretation of closing a door in a dream. Whoever dreams that he wants to close the door of his house in a dream and it does not close, then he is abstaining from what he cannot do. Whoever closes the door: He will marry a woman. If the door is iron in the dream, it is better and more elegant. Imam Ibn Kathir, the famous and great dream interpreter, explained the vision of closing the door in a dream in many different interpretations that the dream holds for many. Interpretation of closing the door in a dream: Seeing the door in a dream indicates the man of the house or the head of the house in reality. Seeing a threshold in a dream is evidence of a wife. Closing a door in a dream is evidence of sustenance, luck, or postponing marriage. Seeing a closed door in a dream is a sign of rejection and great failure for the dreamer. Seeing a closed door in a dream indicates confusion and anxiety that the dreamer is suffering from. Seeing a door A closed railing in a dream that is difficult to open indicates difficulties or problems that the dreamer faces. A closed door in a dream, if it is old, is evidence of the safety of things. Seeing a closed door in a dream is evidence of the firmness of the design in the dreamer’s dream. Closing the door tightly in a dream, is evidence of Great luck for the dreamer. Closing a wooden door in a dream is a sign of good luck for the dreamer. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream with her door closed means that she refuses to marry someone who proposes to her. Seeing a closed door in a dream is a sign of a good job opportunity, but he will not get it. Seeing someone knocking on a closed door in a girl’s dream is evidence of the person proposing to her. Seeing a girl knocking on the door until she succeeds in opening it is evidence that she is trying to achieve her goals in life. A closed door in a married woman’s dream of her husband is evidence of her feeling of security in her married life. Vision. A married woman’s door is closed, but not tightly, evidence of the woman’s fear and anxiety in married life. A married woman’s vision of a closed, large iron door is evidence of the abundance of food that comes to her husband in life. Seeing an old closed door in a married woman’s dream indicates that there is a problem near her home. A closed door in a dream. A man who sees in a dream a closed door that was old indicates his return to his previous job. A closed door in a man’s dream is evidence of great confusion in his life. A man who sees a closed door in a dream indicates that he cannot achieve his dreams. Seeing the door A closed door in a traveler’s dream is evidence of his return to his country. A man who saw a door in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a black suit in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a black suit in a dream In our time, dream interpretations have become one of the things that people care about most, especially if the dream shows goodness or gives hope for the reality in which we live. There are many clues and interpretations of this vision and the following lines will introduce us to the interpretation. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a black suit in a dream Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a black suit in a dream Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a black suit in a dream Many interpretations appear and came as follows :It showed that he will get a life partner in the near future, especially if the suit he saw was black. But if the vision shows that the man is wearing a suit, it means the joy that will come to him. Perhaps the vision is related to the bachelor’s work, because the black suit or suit in general is Formal dress. Its interpretation shows that the work is done easily, if the outfit is great. If the suit is not elegant, this indicates problems at work. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a black suit in a dream. There is a difference among interpretation scholars. In the interpretation of seeing wearing a black suit in a dream, the difference was as follows: If a married man sees a black suit in a dream, this is a sign that he will suffer from many problems with his family. Also, seeing a black suit in a dream is the best evidence that he is focused on Respect and also symbolizes people with high positions. There are those who interpreted this vision as a sign for the unmarried girl that her marriage is approaching with good morals. The interpretation of seeing a man wearing a black suit in a dream indicates that he will get a job with a high salary. If a married woman sees her husband In a dream, he is wearing a black suit, this is an indication that she will soon receive a lot of money and affection, and God knows best. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a woman wearing a black suit in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing a woman wearing a black suit in a dream represents the following: If the woman sees A married woman wearing a black suit in a dream means that her husband will be promoted in his job as soon as possible. If he wears a suit, the vision is that the relationship between the husband and his wife is good and soon God Almighty will provide them with ample provision. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream Interpretation of seeing a man Wearing a black suit in a dream. Many scholars have interpreted that seeing a man wearing a black suit in a dream means that the vision is good and that there is no evil carrying it. Below we will learn about these interpretations: The scholars, including Ibn Sirin and Imam Nabulsi, along with Ibn Shaheen, Imam al-Sadiq, and all the scholars and jurists, agreed that seeing a married man wearing a black suit in a dream means that his condition will change. And God Almighty knows best. It also indicates that his wife and children will reach high positions. But if a man sees him wearing a black suit, this is evidence that he will achieve achievements and other things. Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a black suit in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a mother

title: Learn the interpretation of shooting in the air in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Shooting in the air in a dream Shooting in a dream is a common search and its various interpretations due to its frequent viewing, and the dreamer may think that he is inside one of the action-packed movies while watching this dream, so it is considered a beautiful and happy state. Or are its connotations disturbing? Explain the interpretation of shooting in the air in a dream. Shooting in the air in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Shooting in the air in a dream. Leading experts say that the interpretation of the dream of shooting in the air has connotations, some of which are good, and some of which may be related to damage, especially the appearance of any injury as a result. Shooting bullets in a dream carries signs of anger, the desire for control, and the strength of character that the dreamer carries in general, but it must be harmless to those around him. It is possible that the dream expresses the state of chaos that is going on in the human’s chest, which he cannot avoid as a result of his feelings. With weakness and his inability to solve the many complications that he constantly finds himself in. While some interpreters say that the sound of bullets may be evidence of a reconciliation between the dreamer and one of the people with whom he quarreled previously. But in general, hitting fire is one of those dreams that have multiple interpretations. It has many meanings that vary between positive and negative. Shooting in the air in a dream by Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin, shooting in the air has different meanings, depending on the complete scene that the person saw. And the expatriate dreamer who suffers from loneliness in a country far away from him and in which there is no peace. It is likely that he will soon return to his family and home with this dream. The dream in the meanings of Ibn Sirin refers to the beautiful symbols associated with calm and happiness, in addition to the dreamer’s increased satisfaction with his life and circumstances as a result of the disappearance of sadness and depression from him. And if a man sees in a dream her release, but unfortunately he is injured. Injured, it is expected that he will be affected by something disturbing that he hates and hopes will not happen, such as exposure to a certain disease or something difficult that arises from it. He is trying to escape. When a married woman hears the sound of bullets, this is evidence of many crises that harm her in her reality and cause stressful psychological states. To know the interpretations of other dreams of Ibn Sirin, go to Google and type the Egyptian dream interpretation site... You will find everything you are looking for. Launch Fire in the air in a single woman’s dream. Our dream interpreters explain that shooting in the air at single women varies in interpretation depending on the gun she saw or heard. If it was a machine gun, then experts expect it to be evidence of the many crises that happen to the fiancé and they may end up By separating despite her love for him, but things will become more complicated in the future, God willing. Forbidden. If the girl was injured as a result of being shot, the interpretation is considered undesirable, as it indicates that she will be exposed to a major problem in her life or indicates that she will be afflicted with some disease. If she was shot in her dream, it is expected that she has committed something embarrassing against a specific person and she must Reconsider what you did

title: Interpretation of seeing President Sisi in a dream by Ibn Shirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of President Sisi’s vision by Ibn Shirin. The answer to the question of interpretation of President Sisi’s vision. Interpretation of the vision. President Sisi in a dream mentions praiseworthy things and good events that the dreamer is going through, especially if the president is smiling. A person’s dream in a dream that he walks next to the president and eats food with him is an indication of the great thing that will happen. In it is the one who has the vision. Seeing the president in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s pride and dignity. What is the interpretation of President Sisi seeing Nabulsi? The answer to the question of interpreting President Sisi’s vision. Seeing President Sisi in a dream indicates the happiness and joy that the dreamer experiences. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he has become President of the Republic This indicates a great position that he will occupy soon. Seeing yourself following the president in a dream is evidence of the differences in which the dreamer falls. What is the interpretation of seeing Sisi for single people? Seeing the main unmarried girl Sisi in a dream, its interpretation is similar to seeing the Sultan, which is obtaining happiness and success in her life And God will honor her greatly. Seeing a girl shaking hands with President Sisi in a dream is a sign of the money she will obtain and earn from trade. Seeing President Sisi in general in one’s dream is evidence of happy news and good events that she is experiencing. Interpretation of Abdel Fattah al-Sisi’s dream for a married woman. Dream for women. For a married woman, seeing President Sisi coming to visit her at home is a sign of the end of all disputes between her and her husband. For a married woman to see in a dream that her husband is receiving a certificate of appreciation from President Sisi, this indicates a great position that she will obtain in the near future and will be greatly appreciated. To see yourself talking to your boss in a dream and smiling at him, this means a lot of riches that the dreamer will acquire. What is the interpretation of President Sisi seeing a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that President Sisi is preaching to people, this indicates the advice she receives from some people And she is working on it. Seeing her in a dream kissing President Sisi is evidence of the great status and reputation that a pregnant woman enjoys. Interpretation of seeing Sisi in a dream for a man: Seeing a young man in a dream heading to the presidential offices to meet President Sisi, and this is what prompted him to travel to one of the countries and obtain an abundant livelihood. Vision A gift from President Sisi in a dream is a sign of the kindness, livelihood, and happiness that this single young man enjoys. A man’s dream that he meets President Sisi indicates the great benefit he will receive. A man’s dream of President Sisi coming to visit him at home is a sign of comfort and a way out of distress and worries. Seeing the man whom President Sisi comes to in his workplace is evidence of profit from the trade in which he works. If a young man sees himself entering President Sisi’s palace, this is evidence of the important position he occupies. A detailed interpretation of President Sisi’s vision. A response to the question explaining in detail President Sisi’s vision. The president’s vision. Sad in a dream is evidence of the wrath of Almighty God upon this dreamer. If one sees

title: Interpretation of a drink in a dream - seeing a drink in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of drinking for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced girl: I dreamed that I was drinking water, wine, juice, Pepsi, soft drinks, medicines, etc., according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of drinking in a dream: If a person dreams that he drinks a lot of water, more than he is accustomed to while awake, then his life will be prolonged. It was said: Drinking water is safe from Enemy, chewing is a cure for life’s problems and distresses, and reaching water is wasting money and rejecting it. Whoever sees that he is in many deep waters, and descends into them and does not reach their bottom, then he will be affected by many worldly matters and will be financed, and it is said that he will fall into them. The subject of a great man. Ibn Sirin was asked about a woman who had a vision of watering water, and he said: This woman fears God and does not seek falsehood among people. Then a man came to him and said to him: I saw as if I was drinking cold, delicious water from a piece of my clothing, so he said: Fear God and do not be alone with a woman other than him. You are allowed to do it. Whoever dreams that he drinks very fresh water, he will live a long life and a dignified life, and if he drinks it from the sea, he will receive money from the king, and if he drinks it from the river, he will receive. From a man whose condition among people is like a river among rivers. If drinking in a dream is an unknown drink or sweet water, this indicates guidance, knowledge and taste. Whoever drinks cold, sweet water earns legitimate money, and it is good for everyone except the one who drinks it. And whoever sees that he drinks cold water It is harmful to legitimate money, and it has been said that the vision of being irrigated is better than thirst, and drinking from all types of beverages by placing each type in its vessel and drinking it. From the seas, rivers, springs, and wells, which are detailed in his section. Drinking: If a woman dreams of drinking happily, this indicates that she is associated with actions that shame her, even if she finds pleasure in it. If she dreams that she does not drink clean water despite her best efforts to do so, then she will not enjoy the pleasures that are flatteringly offered to her. Drinking any drink that has a yellow color in a dream is a disease. Whoever dreams that he drank dumplings, or cheese, or drank violets, then he He recovers from the disease or takes refuge in it. From something harmful or avoiding it, he will obtain something that cures his sickness and disease. And if he is seen drinking honey syrup, apple syrup, or myrtle syrup, and every delicious drink like that, then it is good for the rich to open it, and for the poor it is bad because they do not open their eyes. Such drinks are only a disease that afflicts them and forces them to drink them. Apple drink is a blessing from a servant or a favor from a strict man, and a world in which there is sadness. Whoever drinks a drink in a dream for a reason indicates its disappearance, if any, otherwise his drinking indicates the occurrence of this disease. A drink of a separate nature indicates generosity or divulging secrets, justice and waste, and what calms the clinking of drinks shows paths, and kindness to enemies and opponents, and repelling opponents with good policy, as well as What calms. Heat. As for drinks that open the liver, they are mechanical or legal etiquette, resolving matters, keeping secrets, and what appears in color indicates joys, pleasures, and good fortune. Drinking roses, linoleum, and feces shows weakness and lack of trust in the promiser, due to their lack of survival. Perhaps the noise indicates the woman’s sadness.

title: Interpretation of pears in a dream “pears” by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi.. Is his skin good or bad?

preview.html: Interpretation of the shape of a pear in a dream. We will discuss in the following paragraphs the interpretation of the shape of a pear in a dream that we present to you through the Encyclopedia website. Pear is a famous fruit for everyone, and among us does not want to eat pears, but seeing a lot of them in a dream or eating them or buying them is something that is incomprehensible or even this can be expected. Of course, fruits need care to grow, and in the following paragraphs we will learn together the most important interpretations. To see pears in a dream is to see the most famous interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation scholars divide fruits into two parts in terms of interpretation: soft fruit, which is usually more susceptible to spoilage in less time, and often It often indicates the presence of money, but it expires quickly. It is a hard fruit and is famous for its longevity, so it often indicates prosperity, blessing, and permanent money. Interpretation of pears in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing pears in a dream is a sign of kindness, blessing, and a lot of sustenance for those who He has the vision. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing pears in a dream at their time, because this heralds goodness and the arrival of happy and joyful news to the pioneer. Interpreting the vision of pears in a trivial way, Ibn Sirin says about it, portends sadness, worry, worry, and tension. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing fresh green pears in a dream The dreamer was looking for a job, so it is a sign that he will find a new job opportunity with a large salary and position. But he says that the person who sees himself eating pears that are not fresh or damaged pears, this indicates that he will be exposed to anxiety, problems, and anxiety. As for the person who sees himself eating pears out of season, This indicates that he obtains money through illegal means and that this money is not his right. Ibn Sirin pointed out that seeing pears in green and red in a dream is a dream worthy of praise because it indicates goodness and blessing. As for whoever sees yellow pears, Ibn Sirin says: Perhaps it was He suffers from a disease in the period following his vision. Interpretation of pears in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing pears in a dream means kindness. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing pears in a dream out of season as a sign of illness, and God knows best, but a person will be cured of that disease by God. As he suggested Seeing green pears in a dream is a sign of the arrival of a person who has been absent for a long time. It is believed that pears are a fruit whose eyesight is often considered good. Interpretation of seeing pears in a dream for a married woman: When a married woman sees in her dream that it is bearing fruit, this foretells her pregnancy and that her fetus It will be a son, God willing. If a married woman sees pears in her dream, this means that she carries many good qualities and that she maintains her home and helps her home appear in its best condition. But if a married woman sees that she is eating pears in a dream, this means that she was facing some Problems, but they will disappear as quickly as possible, whatever those problems may be. Whereas if a married woman sees in a dream that she is cutting a pear, this indicates that she wants to raise her children well. Whoever sees a pear in her dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking on desert sand

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking on desert sand in a dream When searching for an interpretation of a dream about walking on desert sand in a dream, there are many dreams in which many wanted to know the interpretation of this dream. In interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of walking on desert sand in a dream: We find that walking on desert sand in a dream may indicate that the visionary will be exposed to some major disturbances in his life. And seeing him walking on sand in the desert may indicate... The isolation that the dreamer enters at this time, and God knows best. If a person sees himself walking on the desert sand, this may indicate his need to work with others during this time. In the case of my personal opinion, that he was walking on the desert sand, this may indicate an abundance of money. Which the dreamer gets at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on wet ground in a dream: Anyone who dreams of walking on wet ground can indicate positive changes that occurred in his life at that time. It could be that a person dreams that he was walking on wet ground A sign that dreams and aspirations will come true with God’s grace. Whoever dreams that he is walking on a land filled with water, this may indicate longevity and enjoyment of good health. In the event that a person sees that he is walking on a wet ground, this may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about walking on sea rocks in a dream: If someone sees that he was walking on sea rocks, this may indicate that he spent a lot of money during that period. A dream about walking on sea rocks in a dream may indicate some big changes occurring in the life of that period. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking on the rocks of the sea, it may be a sign of the dreamer’s interest in some positive things in her life during those days. Interpretation of the dream of walking on blood in a dream: Anyone who dreams of walking on blood may be a sign of the dreamer’s bad deeds and must repent to God. Blessed and Most High. Dreaming of walking on blood in a dream may indicate some obstacles and problems present in one’s life during this period. If one sees that he is walking on blood, this may be a sign of some illicit money that the dreamer was obtaining at that time, and God knows best. If a person sees that he is walking on blood, it may be a sign of sins and disobedience committed by the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking without touching the ground in a dream. Anyone who sees in his dream that he is walking high can indicate dreams that he wants to reach. At that time, walking without touching the ground in a dream may indicate the good that the dreamer will gain in those days. Seeing him walking without touching the ground in a dream may indicate major changes occurring to the dreamer during those days. In the event that one sees that he was walking without touching the ground in In a dream, this may indicate the dreamer’s happiness and old joys at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about walking on the sea in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking on the sea

title: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for an unmarried woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: The dream of marriage is a dream that every girl dreams of. The interpretation of the dream of marriage for a single woman is one of the dreams that girls have in their dreams, and it comes mainly from the many girls who think about it, because it is a dream that they want to achieve. But with regard to the interpretation of this dream, there are many interpretations that have many meanings depending on the situation that was seen. In which the girl has this dream or according to the events of this dream, as well as the person who sees the girl in her dream that it is her. It has to do with interpretation. Many girls are happy when they see this dream and feel that the date of their marriage is near. Great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi have interpreted these dreams with many interpretations, some of which predict an imminent date for marriage. Some of them have another meaning. Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a single woman. A single girl cannot dream of marriage and ignore the interpretation of a dream about marriage for a single woman. Different. We publish all the interpretations of this dream by great translators and scholars according to the clues found in the dream. If a girl’s marriage to someone known to her differs in its interpretation from marriage to someone other than Known to the girl, seeing the girl getting married without disturbances of joy can mean success in her next life. Unlike seeing the girl getting married herself in joyful events, songs and wonderful displays of joy, this vision can bring evil to life in her next life because it is one of the unlucky visions. Which a girl can see. Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried girl getting married according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman getting married by someone the girl knows and loves. Ibn Sirin disagreed on this. He said that if the girl wears a white dress and is happy, but without music or a festive atmosphere, then this brings goodness to the girl and that she will marry this person soon and get what she wants. But if the girl sees that she will marry the person she loves, and there is a wonderful festive atmosphere and loud songs, then this It predicts that the girl does not expect to get married and will face many problems in the coming period. . Until she leaves this lover and marries him. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream for a pregnant woman. The dream of the marriage of a bachelor in Nabulsi. Imam Nabulsi believes that the interpretation of the dream lies in the wedding dress, as the girl wears the dress while studying, which means that she will succeed in the academic field and in her professional life. But if she The girl is already going to her wedding, this means that she is wearing a wedding dress in a dream, and that her marriage is approaching, and she will live a happy married life, God willing. And about seeing a girl looking for her wedding dress, the interpretation of this vision is that it portends evil and evil to the girl and that she will suffer from troubles and losses in the future. Her next life. Also, seeing a girl wearing wide shoes at her wedding means that the groom who proposes to the girl is actually an inappropriate person and the matter should be reconsidered. And if the girl sees that she is marrying a married man and knows him practically without problems and calmly, this means that there will be interests Between her and this person. But if some disagreements and quarrels arose during the course of g

title: Interpretation of the vision of receiving money in a dream by Ibn Sirin and senior scholars, interpretation of the vision of receiving money from a living person, and interpretation of the vision of receiving money in a dream

preview.html: All you are looking for is to know the interpretation of the vision of receiving money in a dream. The interpretation of seeing money in a dream. Kindness and fruitful social relationships appear if the money is new, and the vision can express upcoming problems if the money is old and torn, and there are many other details related to the number and colors of the money and who is the person who Serve it. For the dreamer, all of these symbols will find their effects in detail in the article below. You have a dream that confuses you by waiting for it... An Egyptian Google site for dream interpretation. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream. If the dreamer takes money from a person under pressure and has no right to extract it, then the vision is bad and indicates the persecution and usurpation of people’s rights. By the dreamer. When a merchant takes money in a dream from another merchant, this indicates the emergence of a commercial agreement or a joint project between them. A divorced woman when she obtains new money from her or her ex-husband, this indicates the possibility of the return of the marital relationship between them. But if she takes A divorced woman receiving wet or torn paper money from her ex-husband indicates his injustice towards her and the many problems he creates for her in her life. A divorced woman receiving new money or gold money from a strange man in a dream is a sign of her marrying again and building a marital life different from that. which she lived in the past. If the dreamer had quarreled with one of his friends or family members in the past and saw that he was taking new money from him, this indicates that the dreamer will accept the reconciliation of this person and the return of the social relationship between them that was in the past. When the dreamer gets a new piece of paper With a value of ten pounds and the person who gave it to him is his manager at work, the vision indicates that the dreamer will continue in that job and achieve a large income through it, and he may be one of the distinguished people. At work and getting a big promotion. Interpretation of seeing receiving money in a dream by Ibn Sirin: When a poor person finds a lot of money in his sleep and takes it, this dream indicates comfort and relief after a long period of distress and anguish. But a rich man or a wealthy person dreams of receiving a lot of money, The vision will be questioned, and it indicates a dual meaning, which can indicate anxiety, bad conversations, and gossip, and it can indicate sustenance if the dreamer is single. From the parties to a large agreement or a commercial company in reality, and they are waiting for a new entry with a lot of profit and more money. If the dreamer takes a dinar in a dream, this dream symbolizes his extreme religiosity and adherence to the correct principles of religion. But if one takes a dinar in a dream and finds after a while Short in the dream that this dinar is lost from him, then he gets married and has a son, and after several years the child dies, and God knows best. If the dreamer obtains many gold coins, the interpretation varies according to the gender of the dreamer, because if a woman sees this dream, it is an enjoyable scene and indicates food and spoils. And enormous wealth. Learn about the interpretation of seeing receiving money in a dream. Interpretation of seeing money

title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother singing in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my mother singing in a dream. You want to know what it means. Interpretation of a dream about my mother singing in a dream. Then we present what scholars and translators have reported, not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about my mother singing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother singing in a dream can express happiness, and God knows the unseen. If she sees A married woman and her mother sing, this may be a sign that she will achieve what her mother wants, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees her mother singing in a dream, this may symbolize happiness, and God knows all that is not seen. If a divorced woman sees her mother singing in a dream, this may mean achieving goals, and God knows best. I know the unseen.Interpretation of a dream about my son singing in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my son singing in a dream. To see a son singing happily could indicate your strong relationship with the mother, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees her son singing happily, it may be because of her strong relationship with the son, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself singing with a bad voice in a dream, this may lead to loss, and God knows the unseen. While singing with a beautiful voice in a dream can mean happiness, and God has all knowledge. Interpretation of a dream about my mother dancing at a wedding in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother dancing at a wedding in a dream perhaps. Dancing expresses the mother’s illness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the mother dancing in a dream, this may indicate anxiety, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees her mother dancing, it may be an indication of illness, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees her mother dancing in a dream, this may lead to illness, and God knows best. I know the unseen.Interpretation of a dream about a brother singing in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a brother singing in a dream A vision of singing with a beautiful voice may carry, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees someone singing with a beautiful voice, this may lead to good things, God willing. When you see someone singing loudly in a dream, this could be a sign of Bad things, and God knows the unseen. It can express failure, and God knows everything that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased father singing in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my deceased father singing in a dream. Perhaps the dead person singing in a bad voice leads to unwanted things, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a dead person singing with a beautiful voice in a dream, this may be a sign of trouble for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen.
